ACM.1.title: Imported and ACM-issued certificates should be renewed after a specified time period

ACM.2.title: RSA certificates managed by ACM should use a key length of at least 2,048 bits

APIGateway.9.title: Access logging should be configured for API Gateway V2 Stages

Account.1.title: Security contact information should be provided for an AWS account.

AppSync.1.title: AWS AppSync API caches should be encrypted at rest

AppSync.6.title: AWS AppSync API caches should be encrypted in transit

Athena.4.title: Athena workgroups should have logging enabled

AutoScaling.1.title: Auto scaling groups associated with a Classic Load Balancer should use load balancer health checks

AutoScaling.2.title: Amazon EC2 Auto Scaling group should cover multiple Availability Zones

AutoScaling.3.title: Auto Scaling group launch configurations should configure EC2 instances to require Instance Metadata Service Version 2 (IMDSv2)

Autoscaling.5.title: Amazon EC2 instances launched using Auto Scaling group launch configurations should not have Public IP addresses

Backup.1.title: AWS Backup recovery points should be encrypted at rest

CloudFormation.3.title: CloudFormation stacks should have termination protection enabled

CloudFront.1.title: CloudFront distributions should have a default root object configured

CloudFront.10.title: CloudFront distributions should not use deprecated SSL protocols between edge locations and custom origins

CloudFront.12.title: CloudFront distributions should not point to non-existent S3 origins

CloudFront.13.title: CloudFront distributions should use origin access control

CloudFront.15.title: CloudFront distributions should use the recommended TLS security policy

CloudFront.16.title: CloudFront distributions should use origin access control for Lambda function URL origins

CloudFront.3.title: CloudFront distributions should require encryption in transit

CloudFront.4.title: CloudFront distributions should have origin failover configured

CloudFront.5.title: CloudFront distributions should have logging enabled

CloudFront.6.title: CloudFront distributions should have WAF enabled

CloudFront.7.title: CloudFront distributions should use custom SSL/TLS certificates

CloudFront.8.title: CloudFront distributions should use SNI to serve HTTPS requests

CloudFront.9.title: CloudFront distributions should encrypt traffic to custom origins

CloudTrail.2.title: CloudTrail should have encryption at-rest enabled

CodeBuild.4.title: CodeBuild project environments should have a logging configuration

CodeBuild.7.title: CodeBuild report group exports should be encrypted at rest

Cognito.6.title: Cognito user pools should have deletion protection enabled

Connect.2.title: Amazon Connect instances should have CloudWatch logging enabled

CloudTrail.3.title: At least one CloudTrail trail should be enabled

CloudTrail.6.title: Ensure the S3 bucket used to store CloudTrail logs is not publicly accessible

EC2.14.title: Security groups should not allow ingress from 0.0.0.0/0 or ::/0 to port 3389

IAM.11.title: Ensure IAM password policy requires at least one uppercase letter

IAM.12.title: Ensure IAM password policy requires at least one lowercase letter

IAM.14.title: Ensure IAM password policy requires at least one number

IAM.17.title: Ensure IAM password policy expires passwords within 90 days or less
